# currencies

This command allows the user to retrieve an overview of all available currencies. It will provide the user with information such as the currency name, price, and change.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/econ currencies
```

---

## Parameters

This command has no parameters



---

## Examples

```
/econ currencies
```
